name: The hauberk, 'Shadowscale'
data: It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'hiding'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'sneak'.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
It decreases the users fire resistance strongly.
